title: Scaling-Up Support Vector Machines Using Boosting Algorithm

Experiments We compared performance of linear classifiers trained with the Boost-SMO and the Full-SMO (conventional SMO algorithm) on the following three data sets: the Reuters Data, the Microsoft Web Data and the UCI Adult Data.
